name: Lorex Technology
tag_list: diy-video-surveillance, diy-surveillance, surveillance, small-business-surveillance, home-surveillance, baby-monitor, pet-monitor, elderly-monitor
overview: LOREX Technology Inc. (LOREX) is the pioneer in do-it-yourself (DIY) video surveillance and awareness technology. The LOREX Live product line features plug and play wireless video monitoring solutions for homeowners, offering simple and easy to use connectivity to multiple rooms simultaneously. The LOREX Vantage product line includes professional-grade DIY video surveillance systems for small businesses, homes and vacation properties, offering multiple viewing, monitoring and recording options for every angle of the property. LOREX Baby, allows parents and caregivers to monitor their loved ones using features such as night vision and talk-to-baby capabilities. The LOREX Active product line is a compact high action sports camera line built to capture point-of-view recording and time-lapse video. LOREX products are available in thousands of retail stores across North America and online through major e-tailers. For more information, visit www.lorextechnology.com.
